message: Let's start fair, I'll take a bit more since we both know the money will be worth less later on.
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I think we should both be fair.  Let's split it closer to 50/50 this time.
I appreciate your offer, Bob.  I think we can still split the money more fairly, considering the diminishing value. I'm proposing we split it 55/45 in my favor this time.
